questions.explanation:
Using the quadratic formula or factoring:
x² + 5x + 6 = 0
(x + 2)(x + 3) = 0
x = -2 or x = -3

questions.content: A car accelerates from 0 to 60 km/h in 5 seconds. What is its average acceleration?
questions.explanation:
First convert 60 km/h to m/s: 60 km/h = 16.67 m/s
Acceleration = change in velocity / time
a = (16.67 - 0) / 5 = 3.33 m/s²
